channel.title: Comments on: Lego Supreme Court Building

item.title: By: josephscott
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/04/12/lego-supreme-court-building/#comment-34794">Arlene Nicholas</a>.
I'm not aware of a parts list for the building.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Arlene Nicholas.

I’m not aware of a parts list for the building.

item.title: By: Arlene Nicholas
item.dc:creator: Arlene Nicholas
item.description: Any chance there are instructions and or a "parts" list for this? I need to make a model of this building for an upcoming academic decathlon.
item.content:encoded: Any chance there are instructions and or a “parts” list for this? I need to make a model of this building for an upcoming academic decathlon.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/04/12/lego-supreme-court-building/#comment-4335">Julio Perez</a>.
It was just on display, not for sale. Much larger than your average Lego set.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Julio Perez.

It was just on display, not for sale. Much larger than your average Lego set.
